detaileddescription.para: created temporary BaseTexture with texture res object with given dimensions (texture format and texture subtype is used from original)

briefdescription.para: replaces texture res object with new one of new_tex and then destroys new_tex (destruction may be delayed by driver)
forces allocation of texture resource; return true if tex allocated and ready for use
discards texture and returns it to STUB state
